.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkBufferCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BUFFER_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkBufferCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkExternalMemoryBufferCreateInfo
* [[VUID-VkBufferCreateInfo-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkBufferCreateFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkBufferCreateInfo-usage-parameter]] pname:usage must: be a valid combination of elink:VkBufferUsageFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkBufferCreateInfo-usage-requiredbitmask]] pname:usage must: not be `0`
* [[VUID-VkBufferCreateInfo-sharingMode-parameter]] pname:sharingMode must: be a valid elink:VkSharingMode value
****
